text: Daniel Colin (30 September 1933 – 15 June 2019) was a French politician. He was born in Paris. He served as a Deputy for Var from 1986 to 1997. He also was deputy mayor of Toulon from 1977 to 1986, a member of the Council of Europe from 1979 to 1994, and as a regional councillor of Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur of 1981 to 1998. Colin died on 15 June 2019, at the age of 85. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2019 deaths Category:French mayors Category:Politicians from Paris
title: Daniel Colin
